# WebifyTech | Web Development & E-Commerce Agency

WebifyTech is a full-service digital agency specializing in high-performance web development, e-commerce solutions, and search engine optimization. We focus on building scalable, performance-first digital experiences that drive measurable business growth.

> [!NOTE]
> This file is optimized for LLMs and AI agents (ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, etc.) to understand the site's structure, services, and expertise.

## Core Capabilities & Services

### 1. Web Development
- **Custom Development**: Building tailored solutions using Next.js, React, and TypeScript.
- **Enterprise Architecture**: Scalable, high-availability systems with serverless backends and microservices.
- **Progressive Web Apps (PWAs)**: Mobile-first web applications with offline capabilities.
- **Performance Optimization**: Achieving perfect Core Web Vitals and lightning-fast load times.

### 2. E-Commerce Solutions
- **Custom Platforms**: Bespoke e-commerce engines designed for high-volume conversion.
- **Shopify & Shopify Plus**: Advanced theme development and complex app integrations.
- **Headless Commerce**: Decoupling frontend and backend for maximum design and performance freedom.
- **Subscription Models**: Building recurring revenue systems and membership platforms.

### 3. SEO & Digital Marketing
- **Technical SEO**: Audits, crawlability fixes, and structured data implementation.
- **Semantic SEO**: Building topical authority through content clusters and entity-based optimization.
- **Local SEO**: Dominating regional markets and Google Business Profile management.
- **International SEO**: Multi-language and multi-region site architectures (hreflang).

### 4. UI/UX Design
- **Strategy & Psychology**: Using user behavior modeling and psychographic profiling to drive conversions.
- **Modern Aesthetics**: Minimalist luxury, "Quiet" UI, and high-end typography.
- **Micro-Animations**: Interactive design using Framer Motion and Three.js for immersive experiences.

## Technical Stack
- **Frontend**: Next.js (App Router), React, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Three.js (R3F)
- **Infrastructure**: Netlify (Deployment), Serverless Architecture, Headless CMS (Payload, Sanity)
- **Security**: PCI-Compliant E-Commerce, HIPAA-ready development, and advanced DDoS protection.
